entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is mentioned as the team that Harry is a part of. ("And you’re Gryffindor Seeker, aren’t you?‘ said Colin in awe.")

entities.name: colin
entities.description: Colin is mentioned as someone who is questioning Harry about being the Gryffindor Seeker. (‘And you’re Gryffindor Seeker, aren’t you?’ said Colin in awe.)

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the Gryffindor Seeker. (‘Yes,’ said Harry , as they left the castle and started across the dew-drenched grass.)

entities.name: keeper
entities.description: The Keeper is mentioned as someone who guards the goalposts. (‘And there’s the Keeper, too. He guards the goalposts.’)

entities.name: fred weasley
entities.description: Fred Weasley is mentioned as one of the players on the Gryffindor team who are in the changing room. (The rest of the Gryffindor team were already in the changing room.)

entities.name: george weasley
entities.description: George Weasley is mentioned as one of the players on the Gryffindor team who are in the changing room. (The rest of the Gryffindor team were already in the changing room.)

entities.name: alicia spinnet
entities.description: Alicia Spinnet is mentioned as one of the Chasers on the Gryffindor team who are in the changing room. (The rest of the Gryffindor team were already in the changing room.)

entities.name: katie bell
entities.description: Katie Bell is mentioned as one of the Chasers on the Gryffindor team who are in the changing room. (The rest of the Gryffindor team were already in the changing room.)

entities.name: angelina johnson
entities.description: Angelina Johnson is mentioned as one of the Chasers on the Gryffindor team who are in the changing room. (The rest of the Gryffindor team were already in the changing room.)

entities.name: wood
entities.description: Wood is mentioned as the person who looks truly awake in the changing room. (The rest of the Gryffindor team were already in the changing room. Wood was the only person who looked truly awake.)

relationships.description: Harry is a member of the Gryffindor team. (‘And you’re Gryffindor Seeker, aren’t you?’ said Colin in awe.)
Colin is questioning Harry about being the Gryffindor Seeker. (‘And you’re Gryffindor Seeker, aren’t you?’ said Colin in awe.)
Wood is the coach of the Gryffindor team. (The rest of the Gryffindor team were already in the changing room. Wood was the only person who looked truly awake.)
Fred Weasley is a member of the Gryffindor team. (The rest of the Gryffindor team were already in the changing room.)
